instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> sometimes slow
threads.message:
This board sometimes run slow. I passed ASD several time and never got errors.
Also tried usb hdd and same problem. Some days works ok and some days slow. Any idea what to check?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> sometimes slow
threads.message: Intermittent sensor failure? Bad battery? No way to tell what unless ASD catches it happening.
